snippet: News that the founder of the Susan G. Komen Foundation for the Cure would be stepping aside to take on a new role within the organization was greeted warily by advocates of the group.
abstract: News that the founder of the Susan G. Komen Foundation for the Cure would be stepping aside to take on a new role within the organization was greeted warily by advocates of the group.

headline.main: Komen's Leadership Changes Are Met With Skepticism

keywords.name: organizations
